title: By the Queene. Forasmuch as the Queenes Maiestie our soueraigne ladie, is crediblie enfourmed that the infection of the plague is at this present in sundry places in [and] about the Citie of London ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Powles Churchyarde by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
